Literature.Title: Preparation, Characterization and Pharmacokinetic Study of N-Terminal PEGylated D-Form Antimicrobial Peptide OM19r-8.
Literature.Author: Cui Q, Xu QJ, Liu L, Guan LL, Jiang XY, Inam M, Kong L, Ma HX

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2.5µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=5µM),Salmonella enterica ATCC H9812(MIC=2.5µM),Shigella flexneri ATCC 12022(MIC=2.5µM),Salmonella typhimurium CMCC 50115(MIC=2.5µM),Shigella flexneri CMCC 51572(MIC=5µM),Shigella dysenteriae CMCC 51252(MIC=5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=>512µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae CMCC 46117(MIC=>512µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>512µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>512µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=128µM)
